home.pitch: Since my childhood I've been passionate about software development and IT, I fell in love with these disciplines which I would like to orient myself professionally. My constant desire for growth, with the skills acquired during my experiences in multiple European countries, and my tenacity, make me a person today experienced and determined to achieve his goals.
